body:
```shell
export KUBELET_TEST_ARGS=--experimental-cri=true
export KUBE_OS_DISTRIBUTION=coreos
export KUBE_GCE_MASTER_PROJECT=coreos-cloud
export KUBE_GCE_NODE_PROJECT=coreos-cloud
export KUBE_GCE_MASTER_IMAGE=coreos-stable-1185-5-0-v20161207
export KUBE_GCE_NODE_IMAGE=coreos-stable-1185-5-0-v20161207

make quick-release
...
# launch a cluster
go run hack/e2e.go -v --up
...

# check pods
kubectl get pods --all-namespaces
NAMESPACE     NAME                                            READY     STATUS             RESTARTS   AGE
kube-system   etcd-empty-dir-cleanup-e2e-test-yifan-master    1/1       Running            0          13m
kube-system   etcd-server-e2e-test-yifan-master               1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   etcd-server-events-e2e-test-yifan-master        1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   fluentd-gcp-v1.31-6xv14                         1/1       Running            1          14m
kube-system   fluentd-gcp-v1.31-d86tw                         1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   fluentd-gcp-v1.31-pccjk                         1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   fluentd-gcp-v1.31-pnwr6                         1/1       Running            1          14m
kube-system   heapster-v1.2.0-4056778083-4pzp3                4/4       Running            0          14m
kube-system   kube-addon-manager-e2e-test-yifan-master        1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   kube-apiserver-e2e-test-yifan-master            1/1       Running            3          15m
kube-system   kube-controller-manager-e2e-test-yifan-master   1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   kube-dns-4119793748-4pntc                       1/3       CrashLoopBackOff   12         14m
kube-system   kube-dns-autoscaler-526443149-zf421             1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   kube-proxy-e2e-test-yifan-minion-group-66gm     1/1       Running            0          13m
kube-system   kube-proxy-e2e-test-yifan-minion-group-8drd     1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   kube-proxy-e2e-test-yifan-minion-group-p2mc     1/1       Running            0          13m
kube-system   kube-scheduler-e2e-test-yifan-master            1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   kubernetes-dashboard-1083880797-6ffhs           0/1       CrashLoopBackOff   6          14m
kube-system   l7-default-backend-3907025906-5wbq7             1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   l7-lb-controller-v0.8.0-e2e-test-yifan-master   1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   monitoring-influxdb-grafana-v4-x9t7w            2/2       Running            0          14m
kube-system   node-problem-detector-v0.1-hv4zx                1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   node-problem-detector-v0.1-l8tjc                1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   node-problem-detector-v0.1-lbbcc                1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   node-problem-detector-v0.1-mpv69                1/1       Running            0          14m
kube-system   rescheduler-v0.2.1-e2e-test-yifan-master        1/1       Running            0          14m
```

Typically, the dns and dashboard is in crash loop.

Ref https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/34282#issuecomment-270246739

cc @euank @kubernetes/sig-rktnetes-misc

title: [CRI] kube-up with gce/container-linux (previously gce/coreos) doesn't work well
